enchantment.mna.aura-healing.desc: Applies a regeneration buff to the player and all nearby players if their health is below 75%.  Carries a high mana cost.
enchantment.mna.aura-bulwark.desc: Increases the armor of all nearby players.  Carries a small continual mana cost.
enchantment.mna.aura-running.desc: Allows the player and all nearby players to run at a faster rate for a small continual mana cost.
enchantment.mna.aura-jumping.desc: Allows the player and all nearby players to jump higher for a small continual mana cost.
enchantment.mna.aura-depths.desc: Applies Conduit Power to the player and all nearby players for a small mana cost.
enchantment.mna.aura-mining.desc: Allows the player and all nearby players to mine faster with a pickaxe.
enchantment.mna.aura-repair.desc: Repairs all gear in the player's inventory as well as the inventories of all nearby players for a moderate mana cost.
enchantment.mna.aura-pilgrim.desc: A replacement for the beloved pilgrim staff, this applies the same effect to the player as well as all nearby players for a small mana cost.
enchantment.mna.gilded.desc: This enchantment simulates golden armor in the nether, making Piglins neutral.
enchantment.mna.xp_to_souls.desc: Causes some of the XP you collect to be converted into souls.
enchantment.mna.soulbound.desc: Causes the enchanted item to respawn with you after a death.
enchantment.mna.fireproof.desc: This enchantment makes the item it's placed on immune to being destroyed if dropped in fire or lava.
enchantment.mna.bouncing.desc: This enchantment makes the wearer immune to fall damage, instead causing them to bounce off the ground.  Boing!
enchantment.mna.mana-repair.desc: This enchantment takes a small amount of mana per second to repair the item that's enchanted, as long as its in your inventory.
enchantment.mna.beheading.desc: This enchantment makes enemies killed more likely to drop heads (5% per level of enchant).  It will not increase the number of heads dropped, however.  Other effects from other mods still may, however.
enchantment.mna.cloudstep.desc: This enchantment allows multiple jumps in midair, one per level of the enchant.
enchantment.mna.transitorystep.desc: This enchantment creates transitory tiles under your feet when there would otherwise be a block there.  If you sneak, the effect will not occur.
enchantment.mna.returning.desc: Causes items summoned by animus or shot by impulse to attempt to return to your hand instead of dropping in place when the effect ends.
enchantment.mna.bludgeoning.desc: Causes Staves, Wands, and Bangles to deal more damage in melee.
enchantment.mna.duration_modifier.desc: Causes the spell on the Staff, Wand, or Bangle to have its duration increased by a number of steps equal to the enchantment level.
enchantment.mna.range_modifier.desc: Causes the spell on the Staff, Wand, or Bangle to have its range increased by a number of steps equal to the enchantment level.
enchantment.mna.speed_modifier.desc: Causes the spell on the Staff, Wand, or Bangle to have its speed increased by a number of steps equal to the enchantment level.
cantrip.mna.ignite.desc: After a short delay, lights a fire at a targeted point within 3 blocks of where you're looking.
cantrip.mna.halp.desc: Launches a firework from your position and makes you glow.  At Tier 3 and up, summons a random ally on a long cooldown.  The cooldown does not affect the firework.
cantrip.mna.transmute.desc: After a short delay, transmutes either a placed block of Copper into Transmuted Silver, 石製into Arcane Stone, Sand石製into Arcane Sandstone, and Gravel into Flint.  Affects a small radius when applied.
cantrip.mna.gust.desc: Clears out grass, snow, saplings, web, fire, etc. in a 9x9x2 centered on you.
cantrip.mna.dispel.desc: Removes magical effects similar to milk, such as poison or levitation.  Great vs witches!
cantrip.mna.drought.desc: Clears out water centered on you, same as a sponge.
cantrip.mna.grimoire.desc: Summons a grimoire, a book of ender storage for spells.
cantrip.mna.faction_grimoire.desc: Summons a faction-specific grimoire, a book of ender storage for spells.
cantrip.mna.faction_grimoire_nofaction: You do not have a faction, cantrip failed.
cantrip.mna.freeform_spell_a.desc: Put a spell here and cast it when you perform the manaweave combo.  Modifiers will not be applied.
cantrip.mna.freeform_spell_b.desc: Put a spell here and cast it when you perform the manaweave combo.  Modifiers will not be applied.
cantrip.mna.freeform_spell_c.desc: Put a spell here and cast it when you perform the manaweave combo.  Modifiers will not be applied.
helptip.mna.ritual_empty_hand: Did you know?  You can 右クリック these runes with an empty hand and it will try to pull the item it's looking for from your inventory automatically!
helptip.mna.pin_recipe: Having to keep looking up a recipe?  You can pin it to your HUD using the pin button at the top left of the recipe!
helptip.mna.modifier_shift_click: Did you know?  You can hold shift while adjusting modifiers to have it go five steps at a time!
helptip.mna.damage_type_stacking: Due to Minecraft's invulnerability frames after a mob takes damage, stacking damage types may not do what you think.  Look into the delay modifier to add multiple damage types to a single spell successfully.
helptip.mna.visualized_multiblock: Did you know?  Multiblock visualization only shows one layer at a time by default, but you can change that  (or clear the visualization) by clicking the buttons near your character portrait in your inventory!
helptip.mna.pretty_models: Did you know?  There's a forge config option that makes M&A models look much better, and I recommend you enable it.  It's in forge-client.toml and the option is 'experimentalForgeLightPipelineEnabled'.  Set it to true to enable it.
helptip.mna.bind_wounds: Did you know?  Bind wounds is removed if you move or take damage.  Stand still in a safe place for the full healing effect!
helptip.mna.pigdragon: In the distance you hear a pig squeal and smell the sound of fresh baked cookies.  You get the sense that if items related to that were on the ground nearby, something else might happen.
helptip.mna.boss_break_denied: A powerful force prevents this action from occurring.  You feel that in this area, your ability to manipulate the world is limited.
helptip.mna.buff_cache: Did you know?  Some caches, like this one, contain a powerful buff!  You can tell by the lightning in the middle instead of the glowing orb.  They will reset after a couple of hours (including offline time) and can be re-used, so if you like the buff, remember where it is!
helptip.mna.wellspring_lens: Did you know?  In order to capture a wellspring, the lens must match the wellspring affinity.  This one didn't match, and you can see that by looking at the lens.

event.mna.faction_ally_demons: You feel the hellfire flowing through you, yet it no longer burns.  You have allied yourself with the Demons of the Nether!
event.mna.faction_ally_fey: You feel the warmth of summer on one side of your face and the chill of winter on the other.  You have allied yourself with the Faerie Courts!
event.mna.faction_ally_ancients: You feel the presence of hundreds of wizards current and past, their knowledge and power shared with you.  You have allied yourself with the Council of Ancients!
event.mna.cold_dark_prompt: As the ritual completes, a heavy 石製coffin materializes in front of you.  Dare you climb in?
event.mna.faction_ally_undead: As the lich's hand touches you, you feel the breath pulled from your lungs.  You feel cold, getting colder until it feels like it burns. And then, nothing.  Your vision fades to black and you drift.  When you awaken, you feel...different.  You have allied yourself with the Legions of the Undead!

mna:components/drown.desc.magnitude: The amount of breath removed when hit.  Each point removes 20% of total breath.
mna:components/poison.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/poison.desc.lesser_magnit: The strength of the poison.  Higher values will pulse poison damage more frequently.
mna:components/poison.desc.duration: The duration of the poison effect.
mna:components/cauterize.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/cauterize.desc.magnitude: The strength of the cauterize.  Higher values do more initial damage but apply a much stronger regeneration effect.
mna:components/explosion.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/explosion.desc.precision: If raised, the explosion will not light fires.
mna:components/life_tap.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/life_tap.desc.duration: The length of the life tap effect.
mna:components/life_tap.desc.lesser_magn: The strength of the life tap effect.  Each point causes attackers to heal for 5% of damage dealt to the target.
mna:components/fire_shield.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/fire_shield.desc.duration: The duration of the fire shield effect.
mna:components/fire_shield.desc.lesser_m: The power of the fire shield.  Higher will deal more retaliation damage and reduce fire damage taken by 10% per point.
mna:components/mana_shield.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/mana_shield.desc.range: How far away the shielded target can get from the caster before the effect will end.
mna:components/mana_shield.desc.magnitud: The strength of the mana shield.  Each point represents 20% absorption.  Mana cost is increased for higher percentages.
mna:components/mana_shield.desc.duration: The duration of the mana shield.
mna:components/briarthorn_barrier.desc.d: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
The duration of the barrier effect.
mna:components/briarthorn_barrier.desc.l: The strength of the barrier.  Higher values add more armor and do more thorns damage.
mna:components/absorption.desc.duration: How long the absorption effect will last.
mna:components/absorption.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/absorption.desc.magnitude: The strength of the absorption.  Each point adds 2 absorption hearts for the duration.
mna:components/mana_transfer.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/decoy.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/decoy.desc.radius: The radius of the taunting effect on the decoy.
mna:components/decoy.desc.speed: The speed at which the decoy moves.
mna:components/decoy.desc.lesser_magnitu: Controls the chance to taunt.  Each point is a 10% chance to taunt when the taunt pulses from the decoy happen.
mna:components/bloom.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/collapse.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/earthsky.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/earthsky.desc.duration: How many seconds the block will rise for.
mna:components/earthsky.desc.speed: How many blocks per second the block will rise.
mna:components/crystallize.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/crystallize.desc.lesser_m: Determines the overall power of the crystallize effect by maximum health.  Each point adds 20 to the maximum health of things that can be crystallized.
mna:components/true_invisibility.desc.de: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/true_invisibility.desc.du: The duration of the invisibility effect.
mna:components/nethergate.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/nethergate.desc.magnitude: The strength of the nethergate.  Higher will allow more powerful targets to be transported, by maximum HP.  Each point raises the cap by 20.
mna:components/place_block.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/animus.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/animus.desc.lesser_magnit: How much mana to infuse into the animus entity.  Each point adds 50 mana.  Only used when self-casting to animate an offhand item.  Useful for animated spells.
mna:components/animus.desc.duration: How long the animus entity will live for.
mna:components/greater_animus.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/greater_animus.desc.lesse: How much mana to infuse into the animus entity.  Each point adds 50 mana.  Only used when self-casting to animate an offhand item.  Useful for animated spells.
mna:components/greater_animus.desc.durat: How long the animus entity will live for.
mna:components/confuse.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/confuse.desc.duration: The duration of the confuse effect.
mna:components/mind_control.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/mind_control.desc.duratio: The duration of the mind control.
mna:components/spectral_crafting_table.d: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/spectral_anvil.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/spectral_stonecutter.desc: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/divination.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/divination.desc.range: The range at which located blocks and entities are highlighted.
mna:components/divination.desc.duration: The duration of the divination effect.
mna:components/summon_skeletal_horse.des: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
The duration the horse is summoned for.
mna:components/insect_swarm.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/insect_swarm.desc.duratio: The duration the swarm is summoned for.
mna:components/living_bomb.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/living_bomb.desc.duration: The duration of the living bomb component.
mna:components/living_bomb.desc.magnitud: The amount of damage caused by each pulse of living bomb.  Each point is one damage.  Also affects explosion damage, which is multiplied by 5.
mna:components/wither.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/wither.desc.duration: The duration of the wither effect.
mna:components/wither.desc.magnitude: The strength of the wither effect.  Higher values pulse more frequently.
mna:components/transitory_tunnel.desc.du: How long the tunnel will remain open for, in seconds.
mna:components/transitory_tunnel.desc.de: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/fortification.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/fortification.desc.durati: The duration of the fossilize effect.
mna:components/exchange.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/exchange.desc.magnitude: The strength of the breaking effect.  Used to determine what blocks the component can exchange.  Can be increased with or without the modifier by wearing a Break Ring.
mna:components/insight.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/insight.desc.duration: The duration of the insight effect.
mna:components/shatter.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.  Useful for getting around i-frames.
mna:components/shatter.desc.damage: How much damage is done if the target is frozen.
mna:components/telekinesis.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/telekinesis.desc.duration: The duration of the telekinesis buff if cast on an entity.
mna:components/telekinesis.desc.lesser_m: Set to 1 to immediately collect items instead of drawing them to a point.
mna:components/telekinesis.desc.magnitud: Controls how powerful picked up mobs can be.  Based on maximum health. Each point adds 20 to the maximum health of things that can be grabbed.  Bosses are always exempt.
mna:components/telekinesis.desc.range: The range of the telekinesis pulling effect if not cast on a mob, or the reach increase if applied as a buff.
mna:components/telekinesis.desc.precisio: Controls whether items or mobs are picked up.  Set to 1 for mobs.
mna:components/lacerate.desc.duration: How long the effect should last.
mna:components/lacerate.desc.magnitude: Controls how frequently the damage applies.  Each level cuts the application delay in half.
mna:components/lacerate.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/spectral_ladder.desc.dela: A delay in seconds before applying this component.
mna:components/spectral_web.desc.delay: A delay in seconds before applying this component.

mna:tier_0/smelt_vinteum.description: The dust left over from that strange ore seems to have minor magnetic properties.  Perhaps I should combine it with iron?

mna:tier_0/combine_vinteum.description: I was right!  The dust clings to the iron!  It seems to fuse into it slightly from the heat of my hand...should I smelt it again?

mna:tier_0/re_smelt_vinteum.description: This metal is incredible.  I should make a few more and go see if there are villagers that would be interested in trading it.
